result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Take and Drive Vehicle w/o Consent

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Victoria A Heist

records.addlTxt:
Pre-trial conference on November 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on December 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

[MK] case called at 1:57 pm 
Defendant Victoria A Heist appears via videoconferencing from the Jefferson County Jail, in custody, along with Public Defender Cassi Nelson (the PD will appoint counsel).  Public Service Special Prosecutor Melanie Flint appears for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Nelson agrees that the video-connection is sight and sound sufficient. 
Attorney Nelson provides an updated address for Ms. Heist: 415 W. Milwaukee Street, Jefferson 53549. 
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charge and maximum penalties are recited.
Preliminary Hearing time limit is waived by both parties.

The Court requires a $5,000 Signature Bond with conditions:
--not to discuss the facts of the case with the victim as referred to in the Criminal Complaint and the Victim Witness Key 
--to maintain absolute sobriety 
--no possession or ingestion of controlled substances without a valid prescription
--no possession of drug paraphernalia
recess 2:06pm. 

NEXT: (1) clerk- add the Jefferson Public Defenders Office to the mailing matrix, (2) Pretrial Conference on November 23rd at 8:30am--only counsel need to appear  (2) Preliminary Hearing on December 6th at 8:30am

ADDRESS INFO for Victoria A Heist
Current: 415 W. Milwaukee St, Jefferson, WI 53549 United States  (Effective: 11-01-2022)
Prior: 203 N Main St Apt 2, Jefferson, WI 53549

Order to Seal Victim Key
The original document was titled: Victim Witness Key
The original history event date is: 11-01-2022
